title: Oru Kanam Vanam Lyrics Sivappu Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Oru Kanam Vanam 
Singer(s): 
Movie: Sivappu
Music: N R Raghunandhan
Lyrics:

Oru kanam vaanum mannum
tholaindhadhaai thondriyadhey.
maruganam neeyum naanum
pirandhadhaai thondriyadhey.

Dhegamum kaagidhamaagi 
alayudhey eda koranji.
nelavaram maarudhey
neeyum ennai kadandhidum podhu.
kalavaram thondrudhey
neyum ennai vilagidum podhu.

Oru kanam vaanum mannum ..

Thuli thuli thuliyaai manadhukkul 
vilundhu samuthiram pole niraindhaaye.
Nodi nodi nodiyaai uyir varai nagarndhu
iyakkame indri uraindhaaye.

Yaarodum naan pesaadha andha 
oru vaarthai adhu unadhaaga.
agaayam inge paarkaadha andha
pudhu paadhai adhu unadhaaga.

Pulambida ninaikkudhey 
azhagiya mounam ingae.
Paaindhida ninaikkudhey
menmayaai penmai ingae.

Oru kanam vaanum mannum ..

Midhandhidum boomi, thavaldhidum vaanam
mudhal mudhal paarkiren kannedhire.
Kasidhidum nilavu, nasindhidum kaattru
mudhal mudhal paarkiren kannedhire.

Poikooda solla theriyaadha 
en nizhal kooda dhinam unnai serum.
vazhi kooda solla theriyaadha
en vizhi kooda unnai edhirpaarkkum.

Vaarthaigal kavidhaiyaai maarudhey
azhagaai ingae.
swasathil vaasanai veesudhey
sugamaai ingae. 

Oru kanam vaanum mannum
tholaindhadhaai thondriyadhey.
maruganam neeyum naanum
pirandhadhaai thondriyadhey.

Dhegamum kaagidhamaagi 
alayudhey eda koranji.
nelavaram maarudhey
neeyum ennai kadandhidum podhu.
kalavaram thondrudhey
neyum ennai vilagidum podhu.
